availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thornton M. Hall (Webster county, kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. Union County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary E. Shields Hall in Union County, Kentucky, on December 18, 1854. Father of John P. Hall and James Hall. Grocer in Muskingum County, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Muskingum County, Putnam, p.21B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 564.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994056, Union County Marriages, p. 2.
